website_summaries.verdict: Many people seek out decorative wall clocks to match a room's decor, and the IMAX certainly does that. Its vintage appearance and large clock face are appealing, and assembly couldn't be easier.
pros: Rustic, old world appearance blends well with various decors
Only assembly required is an optional pendulum
Oversized clock hands and face are easy to read from a distance
cons: Clock hands may need to be manipulated before use
Pendulum could be missing from package

customer_reviews.title: The right choice and the right price!  Love this clock!
customer_reviews.text: Replacing a clock you have had for 20 years is ruff. We searched and shopped. We narrowed it down to a choice of 3. We decided on this clock for it's "muted" colors, the pendulum, and the price. Most other clocks were way over priced for the same wood and battery operation. This clock arrived yesterday and I unwrapped, added a battery, set the time and added the pendulum all myself, without any instructions included. EASY! Hung the clock and it's working like a charm. It has an ever so quiet and nice tick, it looks fantastic in the living room and seems to be keeping time wonderfully. I'm very pleased with my choice and the $ spent. Yay Me!
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly beautiful, but..
customer_reviews.text: The Clock is utterly beautiful, really, so beautiful but there's something that is a bit disconcerting, in the back of the clock, there is a sticker in the back of the clock that says: "this product contains a chemical known to the state of California to cause cancer" now, cancer is a serious thing, and there's no more details about it, how it can affect us, is it by eating after we touch it for example? or does that chemical radiate? I heard of some elements that radiates and can cause cancer; i don't know if this chemical is one of these elements, we need explanations!
customer_reviews.author: Ahmad S.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Wall Clock
customer_reviews.text: Love the rustic feel to this clock. Great size to cover a large surface area, easy to put up.
customer_reviews.author: Nellie B.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking clock!
customer_reviews.text: Wife thinks it’s too big...I think it’s perfect! Looks nice. Fairly quiet, though it does make a little bit of noise. It’s running just a wee bit fast. There may be some adjustability to it...haven’t looked. It’s not running THAT fast. The hands are a little flimsy...but I guess that’s not a problem as long as you leave them alone.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory F.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful ‘Art’ clock
customer_reviews.text: What a lovely addition to our fireplace. We struggled with what to do with the old “hole” in the brick for an old fashioned (deep) TV. This turned out to be more beautiful than we could imagine- largely because of the clock.
customer_reviews.author: Ginger

customer_reviews.title: Not for close ups.
customer_reviews.text: If you hang it high, you can't tell that it's a little cheap looking. Cute though!
customer_reviews.author: Kelsea McKinzie

customer_reviews.title: disappointed with the damaged side of the clock
customer_reviews.text: Lovely addition over our fireplace mantle. Problem is it came damaged. Hung it doesn't really show, even still i'm disappointed they cant package them without damage. It wasn't UPS, it was the packaging from manufacturing. I'll keep the clock as it's too much hassle with returns. Simply be prepared if you're not hanging it very high, it will show the damage very clearly.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G.

customer_reviews.title: Fits in anywhere..
customer_reviews.text: Love this clock.....put a battery in it and....BOOM.....done. Looks great and great value!
customer_reviews.author: Lorita

customer_reviews.title: Looks good, works good
customer_reviews.text: I saw my friend’s clock like this and had to have the same one. I fell in love with the little hole where you can see the pendulum swing back and forth. I really like this clock. Have had for quite some time now and it’s working fine.
customer_reviews.author: Vienne Suzette

customer_reviews.title: Defective product or bad luck?
customer_reviews.text: Defective product? This is the second time I have purchased this product. For the second time, it has failed Clock hands fail to move. I have replaced the batteries, with no results. Pendulum continues to swing, but hands fail to move. Product failure in only two years. Has this happened to anyone else? Is there any way to repair or replace product?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 2 days!!
customer_reviews.text: My clock stopped working the second day I had it, I am trying to find parts for it to repair it myself, as I like the clock, but would not recommend as its stops at 8:20 pm every night and 5:20, I really wish they gave info on the movement of this device it would make it easier to find the right one, and the hands measure 13" or there abouts and all hands are either smaller or longer, buy at your own risk
customer_reviews.author: Betty Weeks

customer_reviews.title: Think its quiet? Give it time.
customer_reviews.text: Have had this clock six months ago. It has become increasingly loud. Would not buy again.
customer_reviews.author: hannah

customer_reviews.title: The image shown clearly shows the correct watchmaker's 4, ...
customer_reviews.text: The image shown clearly shows the correct watchmaker's 4, shown IIII. I specifically picked this clock because of that. The clock I received has the roman numeral IV on it instead, which is not traditional for clocks, and I definitely would not have ordered the product in the first place if I had known that would be the case. Will definitely be demanding a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Ruggieri

customer_reviews.title: this is the most poorly made item I have ever ...
customer_reviews.text: this is the most poorly made item I have ever bought from Amazon, especially considering the price. Tried 2 different batteries and still works poorly every time I touch it my hands are all black from the coating on the back.. That 's China products for you I guess...The pendulum is laughable cheapest "metal" I have ever seen.. It doesn't need to be returned it should go in the trash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great clock, keeps time
customer_reviews.text: Great clock, keeps time, easy to get going, pendulum looks nice, although it looks like a soup can lid. With that, I think the price for it is a little steep. I think $30 would be more appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: large clock
customer_reviews.text: At first I thought it was too big, but I love how antique it looks and found a place for it amid my art work.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Glinick

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love the clock, but it is cheaply made for the the amount we paid
customer_reviews.author: Nikki C O

customer_reviews.title: Good if you only need it for one year
customer_reviews.text: Clock quit working after one year, minute hand doesn’t move. It’s a nice looking clock, too bad it doesn’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Ron T

customer_reviews.title: Great for large walls
customer_reviews.text: This is a great clock if you have a large room or high wall to put it on. It's a reproduction of an enameled clock, and it looks like it from farther away. The closer the view, the less convincing the effect. It works great, and keeps excellent time. Very large, but light weight materials.
customer_reviews.author: P. Rivers

customer_reviews.title: Fine looking large clock!
customer_reviews.text: This is a good looking clock, and a substantial size to make a statement on a high wall or in a large space. The inside pendulum is a nice touch. Easy to hang, just one battery, and it's all set. An excellent value for an antique-looking clock!
customer_reviews.author: Reader

customer_reviews.title: WHILE I DO LOVE THE CLOCK
customer_reviews.text: WHILE I DO LOVE THE CLOCK...IT ARRIVED MISSING THE PENDULEM...I TRIED TO NOTIFY AMAZON, BUT ONLY WOULD UP, HAVING A WHOLE NEW CLOCK SENT......THAT'S NOT WHAT I WANTED.......JUST A REPLACEMENT PENDULEM...OTHERWISE I AM VERY PLEASED. I HAVE CANCELLED THE NEW CLOCK. THANK YOU.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Magnusson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This clock has been awesome. It looks great and it's continued to work for almost two years now.
customer_reviews.author: Derek barnes

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I had been looking for a clock for awhile. When I saw this one on Amazon, I knew definitely it was just what I was looking for. When I received it I was not disappointed. It looks exactly as the picture. It's sturdy, yet has a nice a nice clean line, meaning it is not bulky. Very nice quality. And the price was the icing on the cake.
customer_reviews.author: Denny

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I'll update later about the durability
customer_reviews.text: Majestic piece !!!! changed the dimension of our living room. Delivered on time! Love it! I'll update later about the durability!
customer_reviews.author: Swapna dinesh babu

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL!!
customer_reviews.text: This quality product far surpassed my expectations! Use this for many types of decor...French Country, Magnolia Farms, Eclectic...Stylish, clean....Old World Beauty!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and hokey
customer_reviews.text: This thing probably cost $5 to make. Basically a piece of cardboard. Very disappointed in the quality. It's very thin and cheap. Looks much better in the pictures. Not worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: ryan smith

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: A little pricey but looks nice and easy to read.

customer_reviews.title: beautiful clock
customer_reviews.text: we love this clock- it keeps perfect time and we love the pendulum.
customer_reviews.author: greyhound girl

customer_reviews.title: perfect clock, but...
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect clock we were looking for. Unfortunately, it arrived broken with the minute hand not connected. Attempts to reattach failed as it appeared to be missing a retaining nut or cap. I was able to apply some tape and reattach the hand and the clock is working perfectly.Other than that, it arrived quickly and looks fantastic on our wall.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Does not keep time!
customer_reviews.text: Loved the clock when it first arrived and looked great in the living room; however, after only 3 months, it stopped keeping time by hours. Too late to return so I am stuck with a piece of garbage that I paid $57 for. Read all the lower rating reviews before you purchase this and put your money towards a higher quality clock.
customer_reviews.author: Bernice Brown

customer_reviews.title: I love this wall clock
customer_reviews.text: I love this wall clock, but after only ONE year of use, it is no longer working properly. It stops every 12 hours at the exact same time. Very disappointed that our money is wasted. Now we have to buy a new one.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ok
customer_reviews.text: Is keeping time but pendulum does not work at all, just hangs there. But the clock looks nice in my home it’s very attractive.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love, love
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, love this mantel clock. I love the "tic toc" sound created by the pendulum and it keeps perfect time!

customer_reviews.title: Just Wow
customer_reviews.text: Wow! It looks better than the picture. Very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Great wow statement
customer_reviews.text: A light weight great looking clock for my kitchen. Nice and big, and live the pendulum that swings back and forth in the hole at the bottom. Hands delicate.

customer_reviews.title: Clock color is just like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: The clock is just the size I needed. The pendulum color is brassie which is not my favorite, but I love watching the pendulum and it is very light reflective. Love the clock above our mantle.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like this so much I bought another for my son as a house warming gift!!

customer_reviews.title: I'm SO glad I thought to look for it online
customer_reviews.text: I saw the identical clock in a local clock shop ... for $200! I nearly bought it there, but the price held me back. I'm SO glad I thought to look for it online! I really love this clock. It's looks great on my dark blue wall with a vaulted ceiling.

customer_reviews.title: Great Clock!
customer_reviews.text: Great clock to replace a similar one that finally gave out.

customer_reviews.title: Great clock
customer_reviews.text: We love our clock. Looks great and works great. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: this is just a very cool clock. i have it on a big wall ...
customer_reviews.text: this is just a very cool clock. i have it on a big wall in my kitchen and it looks great! i especially love the pendulum and the vintage looks is very nice. so glad i ordered this

customer_reviews.title: This is not a functioning clock.
customer_reviews.text: very cheap clock mechanism, loses about 6 minutes every 5 days. Not worth purchasing. Cheaply made, clock hands have a slight curve because is flimsy metal. Not even nice enough to use as a tchotchke.

customer_reviews.title: Don't recommend!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and although it looks as it does in the picture, it doesn't work! Hasn't kept time since the day i bought it, changed batteries 3 times. i would send it back but discarded the box. Don't recommend!

customer_reviews.title: Now it works great and is a beautiful addition to my home
customer_reviews.text: I'm giving this a 4 only because it took a while to bend the hands just right. The hands would stick together on occasion. Now it works great and is a beautiful addition to my home.

customer_reviews.title: So much Better than the picture!
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the picture! This has exceeded my expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Rene Mumme

customer_reviews.title: not a good buy
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these clocks. The first one quit working and I bought a second one because I liked the look of it. Unfortunately it stopped working within a week. It is not worth the money!

customer_reviews.title: Stunning!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely stunning, fun, light weight piece to add to any room.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Really looks great on my brick wall over my fireplace. Keeps good time, quiet and reasonable price.

customer_reviews.title: Love the clock on my kitchen wall
customer_reviews.text: Love the clock on my kitchen wall. Yes it is big - just what I wanted. Not sure why people are complaining about the noise of the pendulum - hardly noticeable. After looking at wall clocks at local stores I'm impressed by the look and the quality for the money. Arrived in perfect shape in a matter of days.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice and good value
customer_reviews.text: Compared to other clocks of this size and look, this is a great value
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Value for the Money
customer_reviews.text: Keeps excellent time. Pendulum is not loud. I have it close to eye level on kitchen wall and it looks just like I thought it would. It is not an actual antique, but I did not expect one at thais price. I am extremely happy with the purchase!

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 2 years
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock but after two years it doesn't keep the proper time.They just don;t make things like they used to.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and works well. Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful clock. Packing was well done and it's works perfect in my bedroom office. It's so nice, my sister wants to take it for her room. Not a chance. The color blends so well with the decor, it looks like it's been there a long time. Love it.

customer_reviews.title: Love the pendulum feature!

customer_reviews.title: How long will this clock run?
customer_reviews.text: I like the size and style of the clock. However, since the original description did not include the fact that this clock only takes (1) AA battery, I am curious and a bit concerned how long it will run before the battery will need to be changed. Anyone have any details on that question?
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Waskovich

customer_reviews.title: Nice clock
customer_reviews.text: Larger than my last clock and I love it! Beautiful cream colored background, keeps time well and I love the pendulum!

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Much better quality then some of the more expensive options out thete

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply Made
customer_reviews.text: This clock looks great from a distance but it is incredibly cheaply made, especially for paying over $60 for it. I would recommend checking out your local Ross, TJ Maxx or Home Goods for a large clock like this before buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Loren craig

customer_reviews.title: Great clock, great value.
customer_reviews.text: I love this clock, looks wonderful over my fireplace. Keeps excellent time, I did have to bend the arms a bit (assume they were squished a bit during shipping). It's quiet. I would say it's a great clock for the price. Lightweight as well which I was looking for. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Karen McGill

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Clock
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as we imagined and it fits our room decor very well. Very nice clock. If I had a negative to report, it would be the pendulum disk that looks like the lid of a tin can. But since you only see part of it as it swings, it's really not an issue.
customer_reviews.author: John55

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Love my new clock! Pretty easy to install. No directions. Packing should be done better as the hands were slightly bent upon arrival.

customer_reviews.title: I couldn't be more pleased. I was really impressed with how well it ...
customer_reviews.text: The clock is everything I had hoped for. I couldn't be more pleased. I was really impressed with how well it was packed and shipped.

customer_reviews.title: The clock was broken when I got it. The ...
customer_reviews.text: The clock was broken when I got it. The pendulum worked but the hands did not move. I did not hang it right away and now it is too late to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wall clock
customer_reviews.text: Love our wall clock! Added the right look to my wall area. Quality is good for the price.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!

It's very quiet and keeps good time.

product_meta.title: Imax 2511 Large Wall Clock with Pendulum – Vintage Style Round Wall Clock, Wall Decor for Kitchen, Office, Retro Timepiece. Home Decor Accessories
product_meta.description: Popular antiqued and distressed. Made from 100% MDF. 23 in. Dia. (5.5 lbs.).
feature_bullets: Vintage Theme Wall Clock: this home decor accessory serves purpose of decorating the wall of your home or office; Roman numeral clock fits well in all types of rooms, from hotel lobbies to typical living rooms

Durable Large Clock: home decor accessory is made using high quality MDF; Use of manufactured wood in this timepiece ensures long term durability; Handcrafted engineered wood when molded with rustic texture showcases old warm charm with antique appeal

Antique Wall Clock: vintage style timepiece is inspired by Parisian cafes, delivers old-world charm and rustic look; Due to the artisan crafted nature of this product, decorative wall clock has no identical

Traditional Pendulum Clock: rustic wall clock comes with a rhythmic pendulum; Ensures good sleep with negligible noise; Quiet performer is best suited for home or workplaces; Bigger roman numerals make it easy to read time even from distance

Easy to Install Wall Clock: pendulum clock is light in weight, measures 23 x 1;8 x 23 inches; Retro clock is battery powered (AA), making it easy to display anywhere, requires minimal installation effort; Pendulum clock can be cleaned with a damp cloth

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars457 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
